author: Garrett M. Graff
title: Birth, Death, Weddings: An Oral History of Covid-19 Disruptions
description: The pandemic is wreaking havoc on milestones and celebrations across the nation.
content: This is the second chapter in a living oral history of the Covid-19 pandemic, an attempt to capture in real-time the stories playing out across our country in the words of those who are experiencing the pandemic. In the first chapter, we heard the voices of t… [+6261 chars]
